# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Returns a new set of text list options using the raw value you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: UInt)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: An unsigned integer that describes the text list options.
title: init(rawValue:)
